column1: The '''House of the Golden Flower''' was an [[Eldar]]in noble House
column2: one of the [[Twelve Houses of the Gondothlim|Twelve Houses]] of [[Gondolin]].  [[Glorfindel of Gondolin|Glorfindel]] was its lord
column3: <ref>{{S|23}}.</ref> and its device was that of a rayed sun.<ref name=LT2III>{{LT2|III}}</ref>

column1: When the forces of [[Angband]] [[Fall of Gondolin|attacked Gondolin]]
column2: the strength of the Golden Flower was in the [[Great Market]]
column3: on the east part of the city
column4: where they were ambushed by a host of [[Orcs]] led by [[Balrogs]]. For hours they fought
column5: until a [[Fire-drakes|Fire-drake]] came and killed many of them. There were only a few survivors

column1: The [[House of the Harp]] was sent to their aid
column2: but its lord [[Salgant]] wished to betray them. However
column3: the men of his house rebelled against him and they rushed to the aid of the Golden Flower
column4: many of them being killed in that market.

column1: Eventually Balrogs and [[Dragons]] who reinforced [[Morgoth]]'s army breached the walls of Gondolin
column2: and the House of the Golden Flower
column4: moved towards the [[Square of the King]]. Further on
column5: many lost their lives holding the rear for those who retreated towards [[Idril's secret way]]. The few remaining members assisted helpless to their Lord's death during his fight with the Balrog.<ref name=LT2III/>
